item.title: IO Power
item.description: Javadocs - Download - Maven IO Power is the first library of Power Libraries. It contains some helper methods for opening Input- and OutputStreams and Readers and Writers. The main purpose of IO Power is to make opening streams, readers and writers less cluttered and simple to understand.
